title: John H. and Cynthia H. Schultz Endowed Loan Repayment Assistance Program Fund
description: To provide loans and grants to assist recent graduate in repaying law school education loans while employed in public service positions and making below a specified income level.
marketingContent: To provide loans and grants to assist recent Colorado Law graduates in repaying law school education while employed in either public service positions or providing legal service to under-served areas.
